name: Kapellmeister (Demo)
description:
Welcome to Kapellmeister, the game where I combined the ideas from other cool ones and now trying to make them work together while adding something new and interesting.

  • Use CCTV on your phone to safely move around the area.
  • Solve puzzles.
  • Use items like UV light, radio to help you complete the tasks.
  • Since you want to be able to complete them, you need to keep an eye on a generator, find fuel for it, and keep it running.
  • You can only see danger on cameras as it moves closer to you.

The inspiration came from Five Nights at Freddy's (CCTV cams, the enemies move closer to you) when I started making this game. I like the item usage from Phasmophobia: not just find a key and use it on a door, but actually use it for prolonged periods of time. And, I guess, Granny: find the item to get the other one/access other area. 

The Full version has 5 nights for story, then you can continue onwards, with each night getting progressively harder.

ANY IDEAS, PROBLEMS, QUESTIONS, CRITICISM ARE WELCOMED.

This Demo will allow you to play Night 1.
If you liked the game and want to support me, you can buy FULL version on Steam!

Thanks!
